title: About <1>BattleDex</1>
paragraph1: Welcome to the BattleDex, your ultimate guide to mastering the competitive world of Pokémon! Created by Gabriel Marcelo and João Pedro, our goal is to simplify Pokémon battles and help you become an elite trainer.
paragraph2: At BattleDex, you'll find everything you need to begin your journey—from a complete introduction to the competitive scene and the foundations for building powerful teams, to advanced battle strategies such as prediction and turn management. We'll cover key formats like Smogon Tiers and VGC, and introduce you to essential tools like Pokémon Showdown! and Smogon University to boost your skills.
subtitleChannels: Learn competitive Pokémon with the best creators
eschoolDescription: If you're taking your first steps into the competitive Pokémon world and need a reliable guide, eSchool is definitely your best choice. With a didactic approach focused on simplifying complex concepts, eSchool provides essential content for beginners to understand the fundamentals of Pokémon battles.
brttarDescription: To start testing your teams and strategies in practice, Pokémon Showdown! is the ideal tool. The BRTTar channel offers an excellent guide to get you started on this key competitive platform.
